en-US: Fluent Design is no longer exclusive to WinUI, UWP and Windows 10/11. With the 1:1 replica of WinUI, iNKORE.UI.WPF.Modern is the perfect solution for developers who want to create beautiful and modern applications with WPF.

items: Authentic Fluent 2 Design System (Just like Windows UI)
Pure WPF Implementation, no mandatory UWP or WinUI dependencies
Flexible and fully customizable themes to match your brand
High Compatibility, works anywhere from Windows 7 to Windows 11
Growing number of controls, and more to come in the future

zh-CN: Fluent Design 不再是 WinUI、UWP 和 Windows 10/11 的专属。通过 iNKORE.UI.WPF.Modern 的 1:1 WinUI 完美复刻，开发人员可以轻松创建美观且现代的 WPF 应用程序。

items: 真实的 Fluent 2 设计系统 (就像 Windows UI 一样)
纯 WPF 实现，无强制 UWP 或 WinUI 依赖
灵活且完全可定制的主题，更好地匹配您的品牌
高兼容性，低至 Windows 7 上至 Windows 11 均可使用
不断增长的控件数量，未来会有更多控件
开源软件，社区驱动的开发，每个人都可以参与
